messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Boomerang Web Site
messages.msgSnippet: Internet Explorer 5.5 is a terror! I went back to 5.0, nice and smooth! Tami ... _________________________________________________________________ Get your
messages.messageBody:
Internet Explorer 5.5 is a terror! I went back to 5.0, nice and smooth!
Tami

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Boomerang Web Site
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the support.  I thought I was the only one who didn t like Internet Explorer.  :) I don t know why either, but I just like Netscape much better. A
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the support.  I thought I was the only
one who didn't like Internet Explorer.  :)
I don't know why either, but I just like Netscape much better.
A

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Boomerang Web Site
messages.msgSnippet: yay! you don t like Internet Explorer either? funny. me too. It s an ongoing debate between my boyfriend and me. I don t know why...I just have this personal

yay! you don't like Internet Explorer either? funny.
me too. It's an ongoing debate between my boyfriend
and me. I don't know why...I just have this personal
attachment to Netscape for some wacky reason.
-Bobbie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Boomerang Web Site
messages.msgSnippet: I do know that a friend of mine who runs a webhosting business has had major problems recently with their backbone server (whatever one of those is...) which
messages.messageBody:
I do know that a friend of mine who runs a webhosting business
has had major problems recently with their 'backbone server'
(whatever one of those is...) which has been under attack from
hackers :-( so if people aren't answering their email or websites
aren't working, this could be a reason...

Tracy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Boomerang Web Site
messages.msgSnippet: you are very welcome! Jessica ... From: A. Yates  To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com  Date:
messages.messageBody:
you are very welcome!
Jessica
 
-----Original Message-----
From: A. Yates <hooperck@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Sunday, March 18, 2001 10:08 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Boomerang Web Site

I do have it..I think, I'll have to check.  I don't like to use it for some reason.  I'll try that.
Thanks for giving me the idea!  I never thought of that.
A

Vaughnde Edwards wrote:

 I clicked on it and it came up fine with I.E. I think the website was not made for netscape. If I were you, I'd trash netscape and get Internet Explorer which seems to work best for most websites.Jessica 
-----Original Message-----
From: A. Yates <hooperck@...>
To: Unschooling <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Sunday, March 18, 2001 9:48 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Boomerang Web Site
 Hi Everyone..
I have been trying to access the Boomerang Magazine at their web site,
and it shuts down my Netscape every time.  Does anyone else have this
problem?
Their web site is http://www.boomkids.com
If you can help, thanks...
Ann

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Boomerang Web Site
messages.msgSnippet: I clicked on it and it came up fine with I.E. I think the website was not made for netscape. If I were you, I d trash netscape and get Internet Explorer which
messages.messageBody:
I clicked on it and it came up fine with I.E. I think the website was not made for netscape. If I were you, I'd trash netscape and get Internet Explorer which seems to work best for most websites.
Jessica
 
-----Original Message-----
From: A. Yates <hooperck@...>
To: Unschooling <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Sunday, March 18, 2001 9:48 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Boomerang Web Site

Hi Everyone..
I have been trying to access the Boomerang Magazine at their web site,
and it shuts down my Netscape every time.  Does anyone else have this
problem?
Their web site is http://www.boomkids.com
If you can help, thanks...
Ann
